accueil.title: Home
accueil.text: Hello ! I am delighted that you are browsing my portfolio. I am a new developer having just finished my Full-Stack web developer training with the OpenClassRoom school. Passionate about computers and technological advances since a young age, I am finally launching into the world of development. My adventure in this world has so far only been good things, and I hope it will continue thanks to you!

card1.textcard: My passion for web development has only grown. Whether it's the problems with multiple ways to be solved but also the impressive community around web development, I can't wait to know the rest of my journey !

card2.textcard: The OpenClassRoom school allowed me to increase my knowledge tenfold thanks to their course which allows me to carry out projects that are linked to real-world demands.

card3.textcard: Speaking French and English, I have no difficulty finding out about the latest technological advances

card4.textcard: I am passionate about Formula 1, martial arts and E-sport
